definitions.definition: An expression of surprise or disbelief.
examples: wait this song is so good whattt

definitions.definition: What do you want? An abrupt, usually unfriendly enquiry as to what a person desires.
Clipping of what do you say? , used as a type of tag question to emphasise a statement and invite agreement, often rhetorically .
What did you say? I beg your pardon ? This usage is often considered impolite, with the more polite " Pardon ?" or " Excuse me ?" preferred.
examples: — Could I have some of those aarrrrrr mmmm ... — What ?

definitions.definition: Indicating a guess or approximation, or a pause to try to recall information.
examples: I must have been, what , about five years old.

main_definition: An expression of surprise or disbelief.
secondary_definitions: What do you want? An abrupt, usually unfriendly enquiry as to what a person desires.
( British , colloquial , dated ) Clipping of what do you say? , used as a type of tag question to emphasise a statement and invite agreement, often rhetorically .
What did you say? I beg your pardon ? This usage is often considered impolite, with the more polite " Pardon ?" or " Excuse me ?" preferred.
Indicating a guess or approximation, or a pause to try to recall information.
